title: (救救孩子)[spigot]BC跨服，服务器有几率在跨服过程中卡死崩溃
txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2020-8-13 09:46 编辑 

服务器一共有3个子服务器：登录大厅，主世界，副本世界，这三个子服务器，一般开服挺正常没什么问题，但是过一段时间后如果有一个人从其他服务器跨服，就会出现卡死【就是后台已经看见了玩家申请的登录：UUID of player (玩家ID) is aec168a3-5870-318f-9dbc-b681cab64de2】然后后台开始卡死，然后出现崩溃报告，大概就这样，我上一下崩溃代码

[00:14:04] [Server thread/INFO]: [BanItem] 检查了玩家 ababbba 的 1 个背包        【##这里开始是正常的玩家跨服进服务器，没发现异常##】
[00:14:04] [Server thread/INFO]: [BanItem] 未发现任何禁用物品 
[00:14:16] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 180/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Saving online players data...
[00:14:16] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 180/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Data save complete for 3 players in 37 ms.
[00:14:17] [Server thread/INFO]: ababbba issued server command: /home azz
[00:14:41] [Server thread/INFO]: ababbba issued server command: /home azz
[00:14:44] [Server thread/INFO]: ababbba issued server command: /home aba
[00:15:16] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 174/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Saving online players data...
[00:15:16] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 174/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Data save complete for 3 players in 36 ms.
[00:16:16] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 178/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Saving online players data...
[00:16:16] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 178/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Data save complete for 3 players in 36 ms.
[00:16:53] [Server thread/INFO]: [兔兔萌酱]<ababbba> .
[00:17:14] [Server thread/INFO]: ababbba issued server command: /home azz
[00:17:20] [Server thread/INFO]: ababbba lost connection: 连接中止
[00:17:20] [Server thread/WARN]: [Essentials] Task #478490 for Essentials v2.15.0.55 generated an exception
java.lang.NullPointerException: null
        at com.earth2me.essentials.xmpp.XMPPManager.updatePresence(XMPPManager.java:152) ~[?:?]

        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:76) ~[CraftTask.class:git-CatServer-1.12.2-3440193]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:421) [CraftScheduler.class:git-CatServer-1.12.2-3440193]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:837) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:472) [nz.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:782) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:636) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_181]
[00:17:50] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 174/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Saving online players data...
[00:17:50] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 174/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Data save complete for 2 players in 26 ms.
[00:18:50] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 196/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Saving online players data...
[00:18:50] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 196/INFO]: [MysqlPlayerDataBridge] Data save complete for 2 players in 25 ms.
[00:18:54] [User Authenticator #10/INFO]: UUID of player Accelerates is aec168a3-5870-318f-9dbc-b681cab64de2 

                                                                                                                                 【##这部分开始服务器就开始卡死了，没任何反应##】

是，服务器是复制第一个服务器后修改的，版本，核心都一样，就改了服务器端口了，其他的几乎都没改
